name: Valid Dual Path Example
description: A valid Intent Spec with dual-path execution

steps.name: Navigate to Search
steps.ai_instruction: Click on the search button to open the search interface

steps.name: Enter Search Term
steps.ai_instruction: Type the search term {{searchTerm}} into the search input field

steps.name: Submit Search
steps.ai_instruction: Submit the search form by pressing Enter or clicking the search submit button
